s_synopsis: Brace yourself for a brand new racing experience - Magno-Kinetic (MK) racing where the action is beyond extreme. You'll drive sleek tri-pod vehicles over tortuous 360 tracks at fantastic, white-knuckle speeds. You'll watch beautiful citiscapes blaze by as you execute hair-pin maneuvers and hang upside-down at speeds exceeding 400mph. Best of all, you'll utilize on-board laser weaponry to blast your rivals as you thrill to racing glory. Killer Loop - you can't possibly go any faster.
